short.value: The XPath or JSONPath expression to be evaluated against the fixture representing the response received from server.

definition.value: The XPath or JSONPath expression to be evaluated against the fixture representing the response received from server.

short.value: The type of the resource. See http://hl7-fhir.github.io/resourcelist.html.

definition.value: The type of the resource. See http://hl7-fhir.github.io/resourcelist.html.

description.value: Either a resource or a data type

short.value: okay | created | noContent | notModified | bad | forbidden | notFound | methodNotAllowed | conflict | gone | preconditionFailed | unprocessable.

definition.value: okay | created | noContent | notModified | bad | forbidden | notFound | methodNotAllowed | conflict | gone | preconditionFailed | unprocessable.

description.value: The type of response code to use for assertion.

short.value: HTTP Response Code.

definition.value: HTTP Response Code.

short.value: Fixture to evaluate the XPath/JSONPath expression or the headerField against.

definition.value: Fixture to evaluate the XPath/JSONPath expression or the headerField against.

short.value: The ID of the Profile to validate against.

definition.value: The ID of the Profile to validate against.

short.value: The value to compare to.

definition.value: The value to compare to.

short.value: Warning Only.

definition.value: Warning Only.

short.value: A test in this script.

definition.value: A test in this script.

short.value: The name of this test.

definition.value: The name of this test.

short.value: A short description of the test.

definition.value: A short description of the test.

short.value: Capabilties that must exist and is assumed to function correctly on the FHIR server being tested.

definition.value: Capabilties that must exist and is assumed to function correctly on the FHIR server being tested.

human.value: Test metadata capabilities SHALL contain required or validated or both.

xpath.value: f:capabilities/f:required or f:capabilities/f:validated or (f:capabilities/f:required and f:capabilities/f:validated)

short.value: Action would contain either an operation or an assertion.

definition.value: Action would contain either an operation or an assertion.

human.value: Test action SHALL contain either an operation or assert but not both.

xpath.value: (f:operation or f:assert) and not(f:operation and f:assert)

short.value: An operation would involve a REST request to a server.

definition.value: An operation would involve a REST request to a server.

human.value: Test operation SHALL contain either sourceId or targetId or params or url.

xpath.value: f:sourceId or (f:targetId or f:url or f:params) and (count(f:targetId) + count(f:url) + count(f:params) =1) or (f:type/@value='conformance' or f:type/@value='search' or f:type/@value='transaction' or f:type/@value='history')

short.value: Evaluates the results of previous operations to determine if the server under test behaves appropriately.

definition.value: Evaluates the results of previous operations to determine if the server under test behaves appropriately.

human.value: Test action assert shall contain both compareToSourceId and compareToSourcePath or neither.

xpath.value: (f:compareToSourceId and f:compareToSourcePath) or not(f:compareToSourceId or f:compareToSourcePath)

human.value: Only a single assertion SHALL be present within test action assert element.

xpath.value: count(f:contentType) + count(f:headerField) + count(f:minimumId) + count(f:navigationLinks) + count(f:path) + count(f:resource) + count(f:responseCode) + count(f:response) + count(f:validateProfileId) <=1

short.value: A series of operations required to clean up after the all the tests are executed (successfully or otherwise).

definition.value: A series of operations required to clean up after the all the tests are executed (successfully or otherwise).

short.value: Action would contain either an operation or an assertion.

definition.value: Action would contain either an operation or an assertion.

human.value: Teardown action SHALL contain an operation.

short.value: An operation would involve a REST request to a server.

definition.value: An operation would involve a REST request to a server.

human.value: Teardown operation SHALL contain either sourceId or targetId or params or url.

xpath.value: f:sourceId or (f:targetId or f:url or (f:params and f:resource)) and (count(f:targetId) + count(f:url) + count(f:params) =1) or (f:type/@value='conformance' or f:type/@value='search' or f:type/@value='transaction' or f:type/@value='history')
